sentences.sContent: The more people who have the virus, the more virus particles there are for that one, fatal mutation to appear in.
sentences.sContent_eng: The more people who have the virus, the more virus particles there are for that one, fatal mutation to appear in.
sentences.sCn: 因为如果有越多人感染到病毒，就有越多病毒颗粒可以酝酿出一种致命的突变病毒品种。

sentences.sContent: Analyzes the factors that influence the stretching changing in the hoisting process and put forward a method that adopting S-curve could reduce the stretching mutation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Analyzes the factors that influence the stretching changing in the hoisting process and put forward a method that adopting S-curve could reduce the stretching mutation.
sentences.sCn: 分析了提升过程中钢丝绳张力变化的影响因素，提出了采用S曲线速度图是可以减小张力突变的一种方法。

sentences.sContent: For example, it is hard to say whether an ART baby has died because of the ART technology or because one of its parents had a mutation that mutually contributed to subpar fertility and infant death.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example, it is hard to say whether an ART baby has died because of the ART technology or because one of its parents had a mutation that mutually contributed to subpar fertility and infant death.
sentences.sCn: 例如，很难说是否一个ART的宝宝会因为ART技术而死亡，或者他父母中的其中一个出现突变，这对于在平均水平以下的受精和婴儿的死亡是互相贡献的。

phrases.pCn: 突变率；变异概率；突变速率

remMethod.val: mut(变) + ation → 突变， 变异

words.tran: 易变性；性情不定；突变性
诱导有机体突变的物质

trans.tranOther: a change in the  genetic  structure of an animal or plant that makes it different from others of the same kind
